page.title: 04OPINIONS-WEST NOTTINGHAM
page.content: We asked people what they thought about the area they live in. The local residents all agreed that dogmess is a problem.In the summer the roads smell and the parks are one big dogs'toilet. The maintenance of roads and pavements is poor.Patchwork repairs are probably the result of rate-capping. Waste-land could be used to build more shops,nursery schools,community centres or playgrounds.The waste-land created by the demolition of the Basford flats could be restored to its former community-style housing. There is a good bus service giving access to all parts of the city.The area has plenty of good schools and the people are friendly.Community spirit is not as strong since the growth of Nottingham from the 1930's.
